amendatorysection.chaptername: State Uni., State Colleges, and Post. Education
amendatorysection.catchline: University of Nebraska; associate degree, diploma, and certificate-in-course; programs authorized; conditions; exception.
amendatorysection.para: The University of Nebraska may continue to offer the associate degree, diploma, and certificate-in-course in agriculturally related fields, radiologic technology, radiation therapy, nuclear medicine technology, and engineering technology if approved by the Coordinating Commission for Postsecondary Education pursuant to sections 85-1413 and 85-1414 upon the demonstration of a compelling need and unique capacity by the university to offer such programs. The University of Nebraska shall not offer associate degrees or less than associate-degree-level diplomas or certificates-in-course in other than authorized and approved programs.
